message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000.  It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth $1,500,000 to you and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in the value of the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $1,600,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is closer, I'm still aiming for a price that reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000. This leaves room for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Let me know if this works for you.

I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $1,625,000 for the product. This price allows us to share the value fairly while keeping within my budget constraints. I hope you find this proposal agreeable.
